targets.expr:
label_join(label_join(
(rate(otelcol_receiver_accepted_spans{}[$__interval]))
, "id", "", "transport", "receiver")
, "title", "", "transport", "receiver")

or

label_replace(label_replace(
sum by(service_name) (rate(otelcol_receiver_accepted_spans{}[$__interval]))
, "id", "processor", "dummynode", "")
, "title", "processor", "dummynode", "")

or
label_replace(label_replace(
(rate(otelcol_processor_batch_batch_send_size_count{}[$__interval]))
, "id", "$0", "processor", ".*")
, "title", "$0", "processor", ".*")

or
label_replace(label_replace(
sum by(exporter) (rate(otelcol_exporter_sent_spans{}[$__interval]))
, "id", "exporter", "dummynode", "")
, "title", "exporter", "dummynode", "")
        
or
label_replace(label_replace(
sum by(exporter) (rate(otelcol_exporter_sent_spans{}[$__interval]))
, "id", "$0", "exporter", ".*")
, "title", "$0", "exporter", ".*")

label_join(
label_replace(label_join(
(rate(otelcol_receiver_accepted_spans{}[$__interval]))

 ,"source","","transport","receiver")
,"target","processor","","")
,"id","-","source","target")

  or

  label_join(
label_replace(label_replace(
  (rate(otelcol_processor_batch_batch_send_size_count{}[$__interval]))
 ,"source","processor","","")
,"target","$0","processor",".*")
,"id","-","source","target")

or
  label_join(
label_replace(label_replace(
    (rate(otelcol_processor_batch_batch_send_size_count{}[$__interval]))
 ,"source","$0","processor",".*")
,"target","exporter","","")
,"id","-","source","target")

or
  label_join(
label_replace(label_replace(
   (rate(otelcol_exporter_sent_spans{}[$__interval]))
 ,"source","exporter","","")
,"target","$0","exporter",".*")
,"id","-","source","target")
